citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:40 AM on 13-
JULY-2023. The inspector first attempted to make contact at the facility at 8:40am and waited for 50 minutes near the
entrance during which time the inspector attempted to contact a second facility representative. When phone calls and text
messages were not returned, the inspector left the site. A second attempt at contact for inspection was made later in the
same day however after initial contact with a facility representative, communication was lost and the inspection was
unable to be conducted.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:40 AM on 13-
JULY-2023. The inspector first attempted to make contact at the facility at 8:40am and waited for 50 minutes near the 
entrance during which time the inspector attempted to contact a second facility representative. When phone calls and text 
messages were not returned, the inspector left the site. A second attempt at contact for inspection was made later in the 
same day however after initial contact with a facility representative, communication was lost and the inspection was 
unable to be conducted. 
 
 
End Section
